Shots Bar Home
Madre Agencia
2024-05-06T19:34:57+00:00
Bring SHOTS Bar
to Your City!
Capitalize on a decade of nightlife excellence and bring
the iconic SHOTS experience to your city.
Explore the Opportunity
OUR STORY
SHOTS BRAND
With over a decade of dominating the nightlife scene, we’re pivoting to offer an unprecedented brand licensing opportunity. SHOTS has become a beacon of quality, ambiance, and unforgettable experiences. We’re now opening our doors to ambitious entrepreneurs ready to carry this legacy forward. Discover our journey and see how it aligns with an exciting path for you.
Mission and Values
The SHOTS Pathway to Success
At SHOTS, our mission has been to deliver unmatched nightlife experiences. Our commitment to quality, community, and innovation has cemented our status as a cherished brand. As we venture into brand licensing, we aim to empower entrepreneurs with our established model, inviting you to join our continued success.
OUR STORY
SHOTS BRAND
With over a decade of dominating the nightlife scene, we’re pivoting to offer an unprecedented brand licensing opportunity. SHOTS has become a beacon of quality, ambiance, and unforgettable experiences. We’re now opening our doors to ambitious entrepreneurs ready to carry this legacy forward. Discover our journey and see how it aligns with an exciting path for you.
Mission and Values
The SHOTS Pathway to Success
At SHOTS, our mission has been to deliver unmatched nightlife experiences. Our commitment to quality, community, and innovation has cemented our status as a cherished brand. As we venture into brand licensing, we aim to empower entrepreneurs with our established model, inviting you to join our continued success.
Unique Advantages
SHOTS Legacy
Embrace the SHOTS brand licensing model and benefit from our unparalleled legacy: a proven track record, a transparent one-time fee, and boundless growth potential. We equip you with an extensive brand toolkit and forego ongoing royalties or fees. It’s your chance to leverage our renowned reputation and bring SHOTS to your market.
Own Your Market,
Royalty-Free!
Licensing Opportunity
Unlock the unique opportunity to lead your own SHOTS bar venture, a business model where you control your market without any royalties. This isn’t just another business opportunity; it’s your chance to own a stake in the thriving nightlife industry under the SHOTS bar banner, with full rights to our recognized brand in your exclusive territory. You’ll operate independently, retaining full control over your sales and profits—100% of what you earn remains yours.
We customize our licensing packages to fit different markets, offering commitments of 5 or 10 years. Prices range from $30K to $50K annually, adjusted based on the demographic and economic characteristics of each territory. Each territory is strategically determined based on population density and market potential, ensuring you have a significant area to grow your business without competition from similar operators.
This standout approach is designed to be eye-catching and clear, making it obvious why SHOTS bar is the right choice for entrepreneurs looking to make their mark in the local bar scene. This opportunity is also ideal for entrepreneurs and operators looking to refresh their existing venues.
FAQ
Common Questions Answered
Got questions? We’ve got answers. Our FAQ section covers everything from licensing specifics to getting started, offering clarity and support for your entrepreneurial journey with SHOTS.
What is Shots Hospitality Group?
Shots Hospitality Group is the company behind the popular SHOTS bar brand. We operated successful bar locations across multiple territories and now offer licensing opportunities to clients interested in opening or rebranding their own SHOTS bars.
What does a SHOTS bar license include?
A SHOTS bar license includes:
• The right to use the SHOTS brand name.
• A domain specific to your location on the
shotsbar.com
website (e.g., www.shotsbar.com
/yourlocation
).
• Digital media rights.
• Access to our proven menus.
• R
ights to produce branded merchandise products.
• Licensees can operate their bar with significant independence, using these resources at their discretion.
How much does a SHOTS bar license cost?
We offer customized licensing packages for different markets, with options for 5 or 10-year commitments. Prices range from $30K to $50K annually, varying according to the demographic and economic characteristics of the territory. Each territory is carefully determined based on population density and market potential, ensuring you have a significant area to grow your business without competition from fellow licensees.
Are there any royalty fees involved?
No, there are no royalty fees. Licensees make a one-time payment for the license term and retain 100% of the profits generated by their bar.
Can the license be renewed?
Yes, the license can be renewed at the end of each term at the market price. Licensees have the option to lock in multiple terms at the time of initial purchase to secure the current pricing.
Is financing available?
Yes, we offer financing options to help make the licensing process more accessible to potential clients. Please contact us directly for more details about the financing terms.
Do you provide ongoing marketing and management support?
To support our royalty free business model, we aim to partner with experienced operators that seek to gain an edge in their markets by buying these rights. These operators do not need this type of support which we do not provide.
We have over a decade of digital materials we will make available as part of our cloud based support model that is intended for operators that know what they are looking at
Is this opportunity available to foreign investors?
Yes, our licensing opportunity is available to foreign investors, including those looking for an investor Visa. We can assist with the application process and help find suitable locations as an additional service.
Who can I contact for more information or to begin the licensing process?
For more information or to start the licensing process, please contact our licensing team at david@shotsbar.com or call us at (954) 383-7723. Additional questions can also be addressed through our Shots Hospitality Group Discord server.
Contact Us
Interested in learning more or ready to take the leap? Fill out our form with your queries and details. Each licensing deal is tailored to fit, and we’re eager to discuss how SHOTS can complement your vision. Reach out to start the conversation.
Submit
Thank you for your message. It has been sent.
